mapper.select: SELECT c.payment_day payment_day,m.id id, m.name name,m.department_name department_name,m.info_name info_name,c.cash_name cash_name,c.description description,c.price price, price * nvl(tax_A,1) tax_a, price * nvl(tax_B,1) tax_b, price * nvl(tax_C,1) tax_c, price * nvl(tax_D,1) tax_d , price-(price * nvl(tax_A,1)+ price * nvl(tax_B,1)+ price * nvl(tax_C,1)+ price * nvl(tax_D,1)) nowprice FROM cash_final c INNER JOIN member m on c.id = m.id order by payment_day, name
